title: Box
description: A box, which is a closed rectangular cuboid.

show.description: Whether or not the box is shown.

fill.description: Whether or not the box is filled.

material.description: The material to display on the surface of the box.

outline.description: Whether or not the box is outlined.

outlineColor.description: The color of the box outline.

outlineWidth.description: The width of the box outline.

shadows.description: Whether or not the box casts or receives shadows.

distanceDisplayCondition.description: The display condition specifying the distance from the camera at which this box will be displayed.
